body_html: @ezyang -- yes we are going to make it a separate type in python, and represent it as a tuple in the script. In the future when we can define new types more easily we can make it more integrated but it is far to complicated to do it correct right now.

body: @ezyang -- yes we are going to make it a separate type in python, and represent it as a tuple in the script. In the future when we can define new types more easily we can make it more integrated but it is far to complicated to do it correct right now.
